One who has not believed in Allah alone and the prophethood of Nabi (sallallaahu alayhi wasallam) will enter Jahannum.

The Quran and Ahaadith are completely explicit in this regard. Some Ahaadith mention that good deeds of the disbelievers will be rewarded in this very world so that they can have no claim on Allah in the Hereafter. Some Ahaadith also mention that their punishment in Jahannum may be lightened.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
